pullRequest.title: HBASE-23935 : Backport HBASE-22978(with sub-tasks) to branch-1
pullRequest.bodyText:
HBASE-22978: Online slow response log (with sub-tasks: Large logs, Replicate logs to HDFS, Filter support in query)
HBASE-24718: Generic NamedQueue framework for recent in-memory history
HBASE-24528: Improve balancer decision observability

beforeCommit.message: checkstyle (not relevant to patch, still QA shows it)

afterCommit.message: HBASE-23935 : Backport HBASE-22978 with subtasks & HBASE-24718 to branch-1

commit.message: HBASE-23935 : Backport HBASE-22978 with subtasks & HBASE-24718 to branch-1

afterCommit.message: HBASE-23935 : Backport HBASE-22978 with subtasks & HBASE-24718 to branch-1

commit.message: Merge branch 'branch-1' of github.com:apache/hbase into HBASE-23935-branch-1

nodes.bodyText: What happened here? Seems like an extraneous change and maybe wrong?
although it is back-port. I want to ask, why there's no table name included. From my experience, use region name to search table is very time-spending.

This can be done afterwards.
So here I suggest, we should create something like TTL, if the connections hasn't been touched for a time, there then we close it, otherwise we should keep it.
why do we still introduce these parameters in HConstants. I thought we have avoided to add parameters in it for quite a long time.
